00021 class WFunctionException : public std::exception
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   WFunctionException(const std::string &functionName) : functionName_(functionName) {}
00025

00046 template<typename T> bool import(WLibrary &library, const char *name, SESWrapperNS::ImportOption option, T &function)
00047 {
00048   function = reinterpret_cast<T>(library.import(name));
00049   if (option == SESWrapperNS::FUNCTION_REQUIRED && function == 0)
00050     throw WFunctionException(name);
00051   return (function != 0);
00052 }
